abstract: It is shown that for the n×n-Hadamard matrix (or, more generally, a bounded orthogonal matrix) the RIP-property for r-space vectors holds, with row restriction to a set S of size [S] < C(Ɛ)(log n)2(log r)r This bound represents a slight improvement over (Rudelson and Vershynin, Commun Pure Appl Math 61:1025–1045, 2008) in that the power of the logarithm is decreased by one unit.
